## Map (drop-in block)

```{python}
import geopandas as gpd
import folium

world = gpd.read_file(gpd.datasets.get_path("naturalearth_lowres")).to_crs(4326)

m = folium.Map(location=[20, 0], zoom_start=2, tiles="CartoDB positron")
folium.GeoJson(
    world[["name", "geometry"]],
    tooltip=folium.GeoJsonTooltip(fields=["name"]),
).add_to(m)

m
```
:::
